name: Large Leather Briefcase, Portfolio, Travel Bag
description: Large Travelers Handmade Leather Briefcase / Travel Bag, a perfect Business Bag. Vegetable Tanned /Italian Glazed Leathers.   17" x 12" interior space, removable strap ... Introductory Sale 33% discount Offer through the 9th of November on our main site at Traveler's Briefcase on Chapin Leather Other Colors Available on ChapinLeather.com  This Handmade Leather Briefcase or Travel Bag is a perfect Business Bag.  Made of Vegetable Tanned Leather or Italian Glazed Leathers.  Hand reinforced stress points,  removable strap (36-48") with buckle adjustment, interior suede with center divider full sized zipper pocket, pen pocket and cell phone pocket,  outside slip pockets (15.5"),  Herringbone hand stitched drop down handles,  solid brass hardware, hand stitched top and centers.   Can have a Brass top zipper,  has a leather knot button tie down for zipper top.  Ready to Ship to you in  15 working days.  I make all my leather bags by hand one at a time.  I try to keep some of my most popular items in stock, most clients customize their products which has a standard turn around time of 15 working days.  More complicated projects may take longer than 15 working days.  Your item Will be sent USPS Priority Mail Domestic.  We use USPS Express Int'l shipping. International customs charges are responsibility of the buyer.  Rush custom jobs* with materials in house are available for an additional $100 *any job under the standard time of 15 working days.    Jobs start when all materials arrive.  Please read our Customer Service for more information.   *Please take these photos as examples of the Leather.   Leather varies from piece to piece and will have slight variations in color, thickness and texture. This just adds to the uniqueness of each case.  (scroll down to find addition items in this category) Notes from Blog post: There are a lot of bits and pieces with all their little tweaks needed before assembly could take place of my new Traveler Briefcase, edge coating, backs and pockets assembled, handles and zippers sewn in, so now...  Twang dada twang dada.... ... insert Peter Gunn Theme Music here...  I can see that this is a great all around bag maybe originally made .... to be a briefcase, but it would be a slick laptop bag, a 17" interior travel bag, a bag which could carry all your secret papers as you made that quick getaway... Twang dada twang dada....

name: CJ Kip Leather Tote Bag, Shoulder Bag, Calf Hair Leopard
description: Custom, Leather Tote Bag in English Kip, with side zipper accents, hair on calf inserts and 8" drop shoulder handle  (can be worn over the shoulder no worry about wear).   Optional Matching,  iPhone wallet, Droid Case or iPad Case.  Available for Christmas at an introductory price . More Info Available at my main site Chapin Leather Use Coupon code IntroSale2 for Discount. Now available for Christmas at an introductory price .   End the worry of wearing your Hair on Calf Leather Tote Bag.  I designed this bag to have the best of both worlds the durability of Kip leather (vegetable tanned calf hide) in black in all the places of wear worry.   The smooth soft matte of English Kip, combined with the beauty and elegance of the hair on calf creating a high contrast which adds to the design.    With my design your worries are over.    8" drop  handle disappears into this handmade tote bag for a minimalist look without distracting from the hair on calf accents.  Unzip and show your stuff.  12.5 H x 15 W x 7 D Ready to Ship to you in  15 working days depending on demand (if you need by a specific date please let me know in advance).   I make all my leather bags by hand one at a time.   I try to keep some of my most popular items in stock, most clients customize their products which has a standard turn around time of 15 working days.    More complicated projects may take longer than 15 working days.  Your item will be sent USPS Priority Mail Domestic. We use USPS Express Int'l shipping. International customs charges are responsibility of the buyer. Rush custom jobs* with materials in house are available for an additional $100. *any job under the standard time of 15 working days is a rush job. Please read our Customer Service for more info. *Please take these photos as examples of the Leather. Leather varies from piece to piece and will have slight variations in color, thickness and texture. This just adds to the uniqueness of each case.  (scroll down to find addition items in this category)

Sewn down standard strap 24-36" or optional removable strap (see information on measuring straps) and buckle adjustment.
